Actually the govt should open up the forum more often  get more ideas from the public. Im sure there will be a handful that are worth considering

Recently the raised the tax for luxury cars  but people can still afford them  but they dont realise those owners dont contribute to the congestion or car population directly. Most of the ultra luxury cars are not driven daily and parked in landed property. Even if driven daily  they cant drive all 10 cars on the road at the same time

Most people don't know this but they can email the minister of transport office directly and pass on their suggestions and they usually get a reply back promptly.
